ygData.subject: RE: RE: [eqbards] twisting 5, added note
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey!! I resemble that remark!! never figured out macros. If anyone wants to give me lessons & help me set it up -- I m here! But then again I like starting a
ygData.messageBody:
Hey!!

I resemble that remark!! never figured out macros. If anyone wants to give me lessons & help me set it up -- I'm here!

But then again I like starting a character getting it up to 30 or so & then starting another. Short attention span I guess


Jovvi Songangel - 21 bard - Drinal
Charai - 27 Druid - Drinal
Athynna - 30 Ranger - Therris Thule

". My wife
>has been playing for a year longer than I have, and yet /she/ still uses the
>newbie screen, only uses the few most basic social macros that everyone was
>telling newbies to write way back when she started, et cetera. I suspect that
>she's learned as much about the game because of my play than she'd learned
>the entire year before that. Hell, she doesn't even link skills to movement
>keys...I link sense heading to left/right, loc to forward, and other skills
>(forage, mend, et cetera) to center or forward as necessary, for example, and
>she not only still won't, but didn't even know /how/ to link buttons until I
>showed her.
>
>=====
>Coffee contains water...so does your pee
>
>Web: http://www.IAmKaz.com/
